title: VA - Living Country Blues USA 1980 vol.1-12 (12CD) MP3@320
description: This 12-CD set captures the richness of the rural American South in all its glory, documented in 1980 by two young German blues historians, Siegfried Christmann and Axel Kustner. Contains 148 tracks in a 12-album series that was released 1981-82 only in Germany, including performances by CeDell Davis, Hammie Nixon, Lonnie Pitchford, Cephas & Wiggins, Othar Turner and James "Son" Thomas. An insider's look at the practitioners of a vanishing musical form, produced in backwoods country shacks, small town living rooms and on rural front porches.
